flavorText:
"We will grow an army large enough to withstand the Izzet's madness."
—Trostani

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir werden eine Armee aufstellen, die groß genug ist, um dem Wahnsinn der Izzet zu widerstehen." —Trostani
foreignData.name: Wachsende Reihen
foreignData.text: Führe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments Bevölkern durch. (Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Formaremos un ejército lo bastante grande como para resistir a la locura Ízzet." —Trostani
foreignData.name: Engrosar las filas
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, repuebla. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous cultiverons une armée assez nombreuse pour contrecarrer la démence des Izzet. » —Trostani
foreignData.name: Rangs en augmentation
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, peuplez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Raduneremo un esercito abbastanza grande da contrastare la follia degli Izzet." —Trostani
foreignData.name: Ranghi in Crescita
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, popola. (Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「イゼットの狂気に抵抗し得る規模の軍隊を育成しましょう。」 ――トロスターニ
foreignData.name: 兵士の育成
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、居住を行う。（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。）

foreignData.flavorText: "이젯 놈들의 광기에 충분히 맞설 수 있는 규모의 군대를 육성할 것이다." —트로스타니
foreignData.name: 병력 증대
foreignData.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 소집한다. (당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Formaremos um exército grande o suficiente para resistir à loucura dos Izzet." — Trostani
foreignData.name: Tropas Crescentes
foreignData.text: No início de sua manutenção, povoe. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controla.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Мы вырастим армию, достаточную для противостояния безумству Иззетов». — Тростани
foreignData.name: Растущие Ряды
foreignData.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки используйте Заселение. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们集结的军队数量将足以抵抗丧心病狂的伊捷。」 ～卓塔妮
foreignData.name: 扩编军伍
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「我們集結的軍隊數量將足以抵抗喪心病狂的伊捷。」 ～卓塔妮
foreignData.name: 擴編軍伍
foreignData.text: 在你的維持開始時，殖民。（將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。）

name: Growing Ranks
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
